name: Noback
description:
Download the game for better graphics!

If you participated to Ludum Dare 50, make sure to rate my game! https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/noback.
Thank you!

It's 2098, and you, a nuclear knight, are going to an underground castle to find your sister Mary, who disappeared a few days back.

Game made for Ludum Dare 50 by AraTheDev using Godot Engine.

All the credits are at the end of the game.
